00033 #ifndef __RPCAPD_H__
00034 #define __RPCAPD_H__
00035 
00036 
00037 #define PROGRAM_NAME "rpcapd"
00038 #define MAX_LINE 2048               /* Maximum chars allowed for the host list (in passive mode) */
00039 #define SOCKET_MAXCONN 10           /* Maximum number of connections queued into the accept() */
00040 #define MAX_HOST_LIST 64000
00041 #define MAX_ACTIVE_LIST 10
00042 
00043 
00044 struct active_pars
00045 {
00046     char address[MAX_LINE + 1];     // keeps the network address (either numeric or literal) to of the active client
00047     char port[MAX_LINE + 1];        // keeps the network port to bind to
00048     int ai_family;                  // address faimly to use
00049 };
00050 
00051 
00052 void main_startup(void);
00053 void main_cleanup(int sign);
00054 
00055 #endif
